/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A blue fence runs along the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, tall buildings rise, their silhouettes forming a contrasting backdrop to the natural elements in the foreground. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
